name: 劉建浩
objective: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction to Statistics (1 weeks)
2.　　Descriptive Statistics (2 weeks)
3.　　Probability (3 weeks)
4.　　Probability Distribution (3 weeks)
5.　　Binomial Experiment (1 week)
6.　　Hypergeometric Experiment (1 week)
7.　　Poisson Experiment (1 week)
8.　　Normal Distribution (3 weeks)
9.　　Application of Normal Distribution (1 week)
materials:
Statistics for Business and Economics
Anderson, Sweeney and Willams
